item.title: US State and County Choropleth Map (Heatmap)
item.description: In this #TidyTuesday post, I try to show an example of putting together six common geographic visualization methods of heat map or choropleth map. Code is available on GitHUB Counties Map data from mpas Corrected to match with American Community Survey (ACS) COUNS (48 states an DC) Map data from albersusa 50 States and DC Using R6 class choroplethr 50 States and DC
